Text: Ameren Vs Cinergy Peak SpreadFletcher We talked a few minutes ago about this Ameren V Cinergy Peak spread bid offer product Does this translates that a Counter Party can buy in Ameren at a discount to the Cinergy Price and sell in Cinergy at the market index price Please confirm Thanks Dave Boone Manager Wholesale Sales AmerenEnergy Marketing South th Street St Louis MO Phone Fax Mobile
